rooms.description: A welcoming entrance with a wheelchair-accessible ramp leading into the house. Vastu compliant by positioning to the south, ensuring positive energy flow.
Open plan living area with a spacious balcony overlooking the garden. Designed for easy mobility and social gatherings.
A dedicated home theater space with sound insulation, comfortable seating arrangement and a screen mounted on the north wall in accordance with Vastu principles.
Modern kitchen designed for efficiency and wheelchair accessibility, featuring lower countertops and easy access to appliances. Vastu aligned with the east side.
Wheelchair-accessible bathroom with grab bars and non-slip flooring. Vastu ensures proper drainage by placing it in the north corner.
Spacious bedroom with a balcony for a refreshing outlook and enhanced privacy. Designed keeping in mind the single occupancy lifestyle of a bachelor pad.

openings.description: Large windows ensuring ample natural light and ventilation, compliant with Vastu norms.
Wide door ensuring smooth transition for wheelchair access.
